# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe holds immense value for those seeking excellence in its field. Given its unique features and the quality it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own this masterpiece. Considering the exceptional craftsmanship and the benefits it provides, I kindly propose a price of $15000 for this extraordinary item. I trust this offer reflects not only the true worth of the product but also presents a valuable investment for you. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
